mapper.select: SELECT c.*,u.avator as avatorImg,u.userName FROM comment c INNER JOIN user u ON c.phoneNumber=u.phoneNumber WHERE c.workId=#{workId} ORDER BY createdTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (content, `like`, phoneNumber, workId, replyId, createdTime) VALUES (#{content},#{like},#{phoneNumber},#{workId},#{replyId},#{createdTime})
